manifest.title: Postiz
manifest.author: Postiz Authors
manifest.description:
### About

The ultimate social media scheduling tool, with a bunch of AI.

Postiz offers everything you need to manage your social media posts,
build an audience, capture leads, and grow your business.

### Features

* Schedule all your social media posts (many AI features)
* Measure your work with analytics.
* Collaborate with other team members to exchange or buy posts.
* Invite your team members to collaborate, comment, and schedule posts.

register-admin.message: On first visit, you can set up an admin user and then create other users.
